pages.text: Spores are a simple but very powerful class of item, which allows the spreading of $(6)special grasses$() which would normally require Silk Touch to obtain. They can be planted by using them against Dirt-like blocks.
$(d)Spores$() are obtained by grinding Mushrooms, and spread $(3)Mycelium.
$(2)Grass Seeds$() are obtained by grinding Grass, and spread $(#58a852)Grass Blocks.
$(#663838)Forest Fungus$() is obtained by grinding Ferns, and spread $(#8a6a6a)Podzol.
